sentences.en: Filing papers at the office is a tedious job.
sentences.cn: 在办公室整理文件是一项很单调的工作

sentences.en: He was not used to the tedious of life in a small country town.
sentences.cn: 他不适应这种乡村小镇的单调生活.

sentences.en: If tedious tasks could be eradicated, the world would be a much better place.
sentences.cn: 如果可以消灭那些单调乏味的工作，世界将会变得更加美好。

sentences.en: It is a tedious, humourless load of crap.
sentences.cn: 那是一堆枯燥乏味、毫无幽默感的废话。

sentences.en: It would be tedious to stop to enumerate them.
sentences.cn: 如果停下来逐一列举,那会冗长乏味.

sentences.en: Memorial services have become tedious and expected. I would like to help break the mould.
sentences.cn: 纪念仪式已变得令人生厌且毫无新意，我想为打破这种既有模式做点什么。

sentences.en: Reading from a tedious technical brief for hours on end, he would stray into difficult territory.
sentences.cn: 连续看上几个小时枯燥的技术简报后，他会不自觉地钻起牛角尖来。

sentences.en: Such lists are long and tedious to read.
sentences.cn: 这种表单读起来冗长乏味。

sentences.en: The arguments are tedious and complicated.
The audience coughed down the tedious speaker.
sentences.cn: 听众用咳嗽声阻挠演讲人的沉闷发言。

sentences.en: The band's approach tends to be crushingly tedious.
sentences.cn: 该乐队的演奏方式往往过于单调乏味。

sentences.en: The camaraderie among fellow employees made the tedious work just bearable.
sentences.cn: 同事之间的情谊使枯燥乏味的工作变得还能忍受.
那次旅行不久就变得乏味起来。

sentences.en: The Mayor recited to the Queen a long and tedious speech of welcome.
sentences.cn: 市长向女王背诵了一篇冗长且乏味的欢迎词.

sentences.en: The tedious job simply ate me up.
sentences.cn: 那单调乏味的工作简直把我烦死了.

sentences.en: The work was tiring and tedious.
There's no point in labouring at a tedious task.
sentences.cn: 辛苦地干单调乏味的工作没有意义。

sentences.en: Thomas Carlyle , notwithstanding his tedious rhetoric, is a master of the sublime in prose style.
sentences.cn: 尽管 托马斯·卡莱尔 的语言花俏冗长,但是他仍不失为一位令人崇敬的散文文体大师.

trans.tran_cn: 单调沉闷的，冗长乏味的，令人生厌的
trans.tran_en: something that is tedious continues for a long time and is not interesting
